description: Small liquidity-buffer relaxation plus basic urgency- and liquidity-based release rule; neutral collateral behavior to avoid new costs.

on_true.description: Always release urgent or near-EOD payments to avoid deadline and EOD penalties.
Release when there is enough liquidity to avoid overdraft risk.

on_false.description: Hold non-urgent payments when liquidity is insufficient.
Release if effective liquidity comfortably covers remaining amount; otherwise hold.

payment_tree.description: Release if payment is urgent or near end of day; otherwise check liquidity vs amount.

bank_tree.description: Rely on payment-level rules only; no explicit release budget or custom bank state.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Do not change collateral strategically; avoids introducing collateral costs without evidence they are needed.

end_of_tick_collateral_tree.description: Maintain existing collateral at end of tick; no automatic posting/withdrawal to keep collateral cost at zero.
